input.parameters_schema_json: [{"name":"idempotency_token","label":"Idempotency token","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Case.External_ID__c (UUID from creation)"},{"name":"status","label":"Status","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"New Case.Status value"},{"name":"priority","label":"Priority","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"New Case.Priority value"},{"name":"comments","label":"Comments","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Additional comments to append"}]

extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.
extended_input_schema.label: Select combined attachments
extended_input_schema.name: include_combined_attachments

extended_input_schema.hint: Salesforce internal ID of Case to update
extended_input_schema.label: Case ID
extended_input_schema.name: id

extended_input_schema.hint: Leave empty to not apply assignment rules; the special value true to apply the default assignment rules; or pass specific rule ID.
extended_input_schema.label: Assignment rule ID
extended_input_schema.name: assignment_rule_id

extended_input_schema.hint: Send a copy of the message to Workato logs. Learn more
extended_input_schema.label: Send to Workato log service
extended_input_schema.name: user_logs_enabled
